title: Bullish Two Hundred Day Moving Average Cross - ITT - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of ITT Inc (Symbol: ITT) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $57.43, changing hands as high as $58.40 per share. ITT Inc shares are currently trading up about 4% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of ITT shares, versus its 200 day moving average:     Looking at the chart above, ITT's low point in its 52 week range is $44.89 per share, with $66.88 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $58.28.
